original_text: They baptized you as believers in Christ. That means that you have put on Christ, like someone who puts on new clothes.
korean_text: 누구든지 그리스도와 합하기 위하여 세례를 받은 자는 그리스도로 옷 입었느니라

sentences.original_text: They baptized you as believers in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신을 그리스도 안의 믿는 자로서 세례를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: That means that you have put on Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 그리스도를 입었다는 것을 의미합니다

sentences.original_text: like someone who puts on new clothes
